Colors

  • #ffffff $white
  • #d2d9f6 $prime-lt
  • #333333 $gray-1
  • #666666 $gray-2
  • #999999 $gray-3
  • #cccccc $gray-4
  • #d4d4d4 $gray-5
  • #dedede $gray-6
  • #e9e9e9 $gray-7
  • #747474 $gray-8
  • #18ae75 $winning
  • #b22834 $losing
  • #dee7ec $listing-lt
  • #557ed4 $prime
  • #4d68da $prime-dk
  • #3c51ab $prime-link-hover

HTML

									
										<ul class="sg-colors">
	<li>
		<span class="sg-swatch" style="background: #ffffff;"></span>
		<span style="font-size: 12px;" class="sg-label">#ffffff</span>
		<span style="font-size: 12px;" class="sg-label">$white</span>
	</li>

	<li>
		<span class="sg-swatch" style="background: #d2d9f6;"></span>
		<span style="font-size: 12px;" class="sg-label">#d2d9f6</span>
		<span style="font-size: 12px;" class="sg-label">$prime-lt</span>
	</li>

Fonts

Primary font: "Montserrat", sans-serif;

Primary font bold: "Montserrat", sans-serif;

Primary font caps: "Montserrat", sans-serif;

Primary font caps bold: "Montserrat", sans-serif;

HTML

									
										<p>Primary font: "Montserrat", sans-serif;</p>

<p><strong>Primary font bold: "Montserrat", sans-serif;</strong></p>

<p class="caps">Primary font caps: "Montserrat", sans-serif;</strong></p>

<p class="caps"><strong>Primary font caps bold: "Montserrat", sans-serif;</strong></p>

Headings

Heading Level 1

Heading Level 2

Heading Level 3

Sidebar Heading Level 3

Heading Level 4

Vehicles Available 100

Heading Level 1 With Info

Heading Level 3 with a link View Link

HTML

									
										<h1>Heading Level 1</h1>

<h2>Heading Level 2</h2>

<h3>Heading Level 3</h3>

<div class="sidebar">
	<h3>Sidebar Heading Level 3</h3>
</div>

<h4>Heading Level 4</h4>

<header>
	<span class="heading-info">
		Vehicles Available <strong>100</strong>
	</span>
	<h1>Heading Level 1 With Info</h1>
</header>

<h3>Heading Level 3 with a link <a href="#" class="heading-link">View Link</a></h3>

Listing Elements

Vehicle Name: 2013 BMW 5 Series lx

Vehicle Description: blue : 68,542 miles

Vehicle Cost: $57,875

Bid Count: 9 bids

Time Left: 57m, 37s left

Time Left (winning): 57m, 37s left

Time Left (losing): 57m, 37s left

Watching Tag: watching

Winning Tag: winning

Losing Tag: outbid

Vehicle Thumb

HTML

									
										<p>
	Vehicle Name:
	<span class="vehicle-name">2013 BMW 5 Series lx</span>
</p>

<p>
	Vehicle Description:
	<span class="vehicle-desc">blue : 68,542 miles</span>
</p>

<p>
	Vehicle Cost:
	<span class="vehicle-cost">$57,875</span>
</p>

<p>
	Bid Count:
	<span class="bid-count"><strong>9</strong> bids</span>
</p>

<p>
	Time Left:
	<span class="time-left">57m, 37s left</span>
</p>

<p>
	Time Left (winning):
	<span class="time-left winning">57m, 37s left</span>
</p>

<p>
	Time Left (losing):
	<span class="time-left losing">57m, 37s left</span>
</p>

<p>
	Watching Tag:
	<span class="listing-tag">watching</span>
</p>

<p>
	Winning Tag:
	<span class="listing-tag winning-tag">winning</span>
</p>

<p>
	Losing Tag:
	<span class="listing-tag losing-tag">outbid</span>
</p>

<p>
	Vehicle Thumb
	<div class="vehicle-thumb">
		<img src="/img/vehicle-thumb.jpg" alt="Vehicle Thumb" />
	</div>
</p>

Hr

HTML

									
										<hr />

Striped List

Striped List

  • List Item 1
  • List Item 2
  • List Item 3
  • List Item 4
  • List Item 5

Nested Striped List

  • List Item 1 (2)
    • Sublist Item 1
    • Sublist Item 2
  • List Item 2 (1)
    • Sublist Item 1
  • Sublist Item 3 (0)

HTML

									
										<h3>Striped List</h3>
<ul class="striped-list">
	<li>List Item 1</li>
	<li>List Item 2</li>
	<li>List Item 3</li>
	<li>List Item 4</li>
	<li>List Item 5</li>
</ul>

<h3>Nested Striped List</h3>
<ul class="striped-list">
	<li>List Item 1 <span class="available">(2)</span></li>
	<li>
		<ul class="dashboard-list">
			<li><a href="#">Sublist Item 1</a></li>
			<li><a href="#">Sublist Item 2</a></li>
		</ul>
	</li>
	<li>List Item 2 <span class="available">(1)</span></li>
	<li>
		<ul class="dashboard-list">
			<li><a href="#">Sublist Item 1</a></li>
		</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Sublist Item 3 <span class="available">(0)</span></li>
</ul>

Text Fields

$
$
▲ ▼

HTML

									
										<div class="form-group text">
	<label class="control-label" for="text">Text Input <sup title="Required">*</sup></label>
	<input class="form-control" id="text" name="text" type="text" placeholder="Text Input" />
</div>

<div class="form-group text">
	<label class="control-label" for="text">Dollar Text Input</label>
	<div class="input-group">
		<div class="input-group-addon">$</div>
		<input class="form-control" id="text" name="text" type="text" placeholder="Text Input" />
	</div>
</div>

<div class="form-group text">
	<label class="control-label" for="text-increment">Dollar Text Input With Buttons</label>
	<div class="input-group adjust-group">
		<div class="input-group-addon">$</div>
		<input class="form-control" data-atd-increment="100" id="text-increment" name="text-increment" type="text" value="45,500" />
		<div class="input-group-addon adjust-buttons">
			<a href="#" class="btn" data-atd-increment-up="text-increment">▲</a>
			<a href="#" class="btn" data-atd-increment-down="text-increment">▼</a>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

<div class="form-group textarea">
	<label class="control-label" for="textarea">Textarea</label>
	<textarea class="form-control" id="textarea" name="textarea" rows="8" cols="48" placeholder="Enter your message here"></textarea>
</div>

<div class="form-group has-error text">
	<label class="control-label">Error Input</label>
	<input class="form-control" type="text" placeholder="Text Input" />
</div>

<div class="form-group has-warning text">
	<label class="control-label">Warning Input</label>
	<input class="form-control" type="text" placeholder="Text Input" />
</div>

<div class="form-group has-success text">
	<label class="control-label">Valid</label>
	<input class="form-control" type="text" placeholder="Text Input" />
</div>

		<option>Option Two</option>
		<option>Option Three</option>
	</select>
</div>

	</select>

	</select>

Checkbox

HTML

									
										<div class="form-group">
   	<label class="control-label">Checkboxes</label>
   	<div class="checkbox-group">
	   	<input type="checkbox" id="checkbox-checked" name="checkbox-checked" checked="checked" />
	   	<label for="checkbox-checked">Checked</label>

		<input type="checkbox" id="checkbox-unchecked" name="checkbox-unchecked" />
		<label for="checkbox-unchecked">Unchecked</label>
	</div>
</div>

<div class="form-group">
   	<label class="control-label">Checkboxes Horizontal</label>
   	<div class="checkbox-group checkbox-inline">
	   	<input type="checkbox" id="checkbox-checked2" name="checkbox-checked2" checked="checked" />
	   	<label for="checkbox-checked2">Checked</label>

		<input type="checkbox" id="checkbox-unchecked2" name="checkbox-unchecked2" />
		<label for="checkbox-unchecked2">Unchecked</label>
	</div>

Radio Buttons

HTML

									
										<div class="form-group">
   	<label class="control-label">Radio Buttons</label>
   	<div class="radio-group">
	   	<input type="radio" id="radio-alpha" name="radio-group-alpha" checked="checked" />
	   	<label for="radio-alpha">Yes</label>

		<input type="radio" id="radio-beta" name="radio-group-alpha" />
		<label for="radio-beta">No</label>
	</div>
</div>

<div class="form-group">
   	<label class="control-label">Radio Buttons - disabled</label>
   	<div class="radio-group disabled">
	   	<input type="radio" id="radio-alpha" name="radio-group-alpha-delta" checked="checked" disabled="disabled" />
	   	<label for="radio-alpha-delta" class="disabled">Yes</label>

		<input type="radio" id="radio-beta" name="radio-group-alpha-delta" disabled="disabled"/>
		<label for="radio-alpha-delta" class="disabled">No</label>
		<!-- the bootstrap pattern 
		<label class="disabled">
		    <input type="checkbox" value="" disabled="disabled" class="disabled">
		    Option two is disabled
		</label>
		-->
	</div>
</div>

<div class="form-group">
   	<label class="control-label">Radio Buttons Horizontal</label>
   	<div class="radio-group radio-inline">

		<input type="radio" id="radio-epsilon" name="radio-group-beta" />
		<label for="radio-epsilon">No</label>
	</div>
</div>

										<table class="table" data-tablesaw-mode="swipe" data-tablesaw-minimap>
	<thead>
		<tr>
			<th class="active asc sort">Description</th>
			<th class="sort">VIN</th>
			<th class="sort">My High Bid</th>
			<th class="sort">Winning Bid</th>
			<th class="sort">Status</th>
			<th class="sort">End Date</th>
			<th class="sort">Vendor</th>
			<th class="sort">Sales Channel</th>
		</tr>
	</thead>

		</tr>

			<td>2014 320i</td>
			<td>1234567890ABCDEFG</td>
			<td>$65,000</td>
			<td>$65,000</td>
			<td>Won</td>
			<td>01/15/15 - 23:07</td>
			<td>BMW</td>
			<td>Web Auction</td>
		</tr>

Chart

Hello world.

HTML

									
										Hello world.

<style>
/* 
  make each pie piece a rectangle twice as high as it is wide.
  move the transform origin to the middle of the left side.
  Also ensure that overflow is set to hidden.
*/
  .pie {
		position:absolute;
		width:100px;
		height:200px;
		overflow:hidden;
		left:150px;
		-moz-transform-origin:left center;
		-ms-transform-origin:left center;
		-o-transform-origin:left center;
		-webkit-transform-origin:left center;
		transform-origin:left center;
	}
/*
  unless the piece represents more than 50% of the whole chart.
  then make it a square, and ensure the transform origin is
  back in the center.

  NOTE: since this is only ever a single piece, you could
  move this to a piece specific rule and remove the extra class
*/
	.pie.big {
		width:200px;
		height:200px;
		left:50px;
		-moz-transform-origin:center center;
		-ms-transform-origin:center center;
		-o-transform-origin:center center;
		-webkit-transform-origin:center center;
		transform-origin:center center;
	}
/*
  this is the actual visible part of the pie. 
  Give it the same dimensions as the regular piece.
  Use border radius make it a half circle.
  move transform origin to the middle of the right side.
  Push it out to the left of the containing box.
*/
	.pie:BEFORE {
		content:"";
		position:absolute;
		width:100px;
		height:200px;
		left:-100px;
		border-radius:100px 0 0 100px;
		-moz-transform-origin:right center;
		-ms-transform-origin:right center;
		-o-transform-origin:right center;
		-webkit-transform-origin:right center;
		transform-origin:right center;
		
	}
 /* if it's part of a big piece, bring it back into the square */
	.pie.big:BEFORE {
		left:0px;
	}
/* 
  big pieces will also need a second semicircle, pointed in the
  opposite direction to hide the first part behind.
*/
	.pie.big:AFTER {
		content:"";
		position:absolute;
		width:100px;
		height:200px;
		left:100px;
		border-radius:0 100px 100px 0;
	}
/*
  add colour to each piece.
*/
	.pie:nth-of-type(1):BEFORE,
	.pie:nth-of-type(1):AFTER {
		background-color:blue;	
	}
	.pie:nth-of-type(2):AFTER,
	.pie:nth-of-type(2):BEFORE {
		background-color:green;	
	}
	.pie:nth-of-type(3):AFTER,
	.pie:nth-of-type(3):BEFORE {
		background-color:red;	
	}
	.pie:nth-of-type(4):AFTER,
	.pie:nth-of-type(4):BEFORE {
		background-color:orange;	
	}
/*
  now rotate each piece based on their cumulative starting
  position
*/
	.pie[data-start="30"] {
		-moz-transform: rotate(30deg); /* Firefox */
		-ms-transform: rotate(30deg); /* IE */
		-webkit-transform: rotate(30deg); /* Safari and Chrome */
		-o-transform: rotate(30deg); /* Opera */
		transform:rotate(30deg);
	}
	.pie[data-start="60"] {
		-moz-transform: rotate(60deg); /* Firefox */
		-ms-transform: rotate(60deg); /* IE */
		-webkit-transform: rotate(60deg); /* Safari and Chrome */
		-o-transform: rotate(60deg); /* Opera */
		transform:rotate(60deg);
	}
	.pie[data-start="100"] {
		-moz-transform: rotate(100deg); /* Firefox */
		-ms-transform: rotate(100deg); /* IE */
		-webkit-transform: rotate(100deg); /* Safari and Chrome */
		-o-transform: rotate(100deg); /* Opera */
		transform:rotate(100deg);
	}
/*
  and rotate the amount of the pie that's showing.

  NOTE: add an extra degree to all but the final piece, 
  to fill in unsightly gaps.
*/
	.pie[data-value="30"]:BEFORE {
		-moz-transform: rotate(31deg); /* Firefox */
		-ms-transform: rotate(31deg); /* IE */
		-webkit-transform: rotate(31deg); /* Safari and Chrome */
		-o-transform: rotate(31deg); /* Opera */
		transform:rotate(31deg);
	}
	.pie[data-value="40"]:BEFORE {
		-moz-transform: rotate(41deg); /* Firefox */
		-ms-transform: rotate(41deg); /* IE */
		-webkit-transform: rotate(41deg); /* Safari and Chrome */
		-o-transform: rotate(41deg); /* Opera */
		transform:rotate(41deg);
	}
	.pie[data-value="260"]:BEFORE {
		-moz-transform: rotate(260deg); /* Firefox */
		-ms-transform: rotate(260deg); /* IE */
		-webkit-transform: rotate(260deg); /* Safari and Chrome */
		-o-transform: rotate(260deg); /* Opera */
		transform:rotate(260deg);
	}
/*
NOTE: you could also apply custom classes (i.e. .s0 .v30)
but if the CSS3 attr() function proposal ever gets implemented,
then all the above custom piece rules could be replaced with
the following:

.pie[data-start] {
   transform:rotate(attr(data-start,deg,0);
}
.pie[data-value]:BEFORE {
   transform:rotate(attr(data-value,deg,0);
}
*/

</style>

<!-- 
for each piece of the pie chart create one div and give it
a data-value attribute that represents the amount (in degrees) that
represents its total visible portion, and a data-start attribute
that matches the amount rotation for the starting  (the cumulative value amount of all the previous pieces).

 
-->
<div class="pie" data-start="0" data-value="30"></div>
<div class="pie highlight" data-start="30" data-value="30"></div>
<div class="pie" data-start="60" data-value="40"></div>
<div class="pie big" data-start="100" data-value="260"></div>

Left Sidebar

sidebar

Some sidebar content here

This is the main content container

Some content here

HTML

									
										<div class="container">
	<div class="row">
		<aside class="sidebar col-sm-3 extra-gutter">
			<h3>sidebar</h3>
			Some sidebar content here
		</aside>

		<div class="content col-sm-9">
			<h1>This is the main content container</h1>
			Some content here
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

To
Choose Date

HTML

									
										<div class="form-group select">
    <label class="control-label">Control Range Select</label>
    <div class="control-range">
	    <div class="range-group">
		    <select  class="form-control" id="rs-select-start">
		        <option>option 1</option>
		        <option>option 2</option>
		        <option>option 3</option>
		    </select>
		    <label class="visually-hidden" for="rs-select-start">Range Start</label>
	    </div>

	    <span class="connector">To</span>

	    <div class="range-group">
		    <select class="form-control" id="rs-select-end">
		        
		        <option>option 1</option>
		        <option>option 2</option>
		        <option>option 3</option>
		    </select>
		    <label class="visually-hidden" for="rs-select-end">Range End</label>
	    </div>
	</div>
</div>

<div class="form-group text">
    <label class="control-label">Control Range Text</label>
    <div class="control-range">
	    <div class="range-group">
		    <input class="form-control" type="text" id="rs-text-start">
		    <label class="visually-hidden" for="rs-text-start">Range Start</label>
	    </div>

	    <span class="connector">To</span>

	    <div class="range-group">
		    <input class="form-control" type="text" id="rs-text-end">
		    <label class="visually-hidden" for="rs-text-end">Range End</label>
	    </div>
	</div>
</div>

<div class="form-group date">
    <label class="control-label">Control Range Date</label>
    <div class="control-range date-range">
	    <span class="connector">From</span>

	    <div class="range-group">
		    <div class="date-group">
			    <input class="form-control datepicker" id="date-start" type="text" placeholder="02/09/2015">
			    <a href="#" class="btn btn-calendar">Choose Date</a>
		    </div>
		    <label class="visually-hidden" for="rs-date-start">Start Date</label>
	    </div>

	    <span class="connector">To</span>

	    <div class="range-group">
		    <div class="date-group">
			    <input class="form-control datepicker" id="date-end" type="text" placeholder="02/09/2015">
			    <a href="#" class="btn btn-calendar">Choose Date</a>
		    </div>
		    <label class="visually-hidden" for="rs-date-end">End Date</label>
	    </div>
	</div>
</div>

		<input type="checkbox" class="required" id="api-terms" name="api-terms" value="true" required data-error-message="Please agree to the terms." />
		<label class="terms-checkbox" for="api-terms">Dealer hereby (i) authorizes RMS Automotive, LLC and any affiliate or service provider acting on its behalf to initiate electronic credit and debit entries to or from Dealer’s checking account designated above for the purpose of administering or facilitating any online vehicle transaction, include any purchase or sale transaction, or any unwind, refund or other reversal resulting from any vehicle arbitration; and (ii) agrees to the Terms and Conditions for Electronic Transactions, which include additional terms and conditions applicable to Dealer and electronic transactions generally.</label>
	</div>
</div>

Sidebar Search

My Search

X Make x BMW
X Model x 5 Series x 3 Series
X Trim x LX
X Year x 2001–2014
X Mileage x < 100,000 miles
X Price x < $25,000

Refine Your Search > < Hide Search Filters

HTML

									
										<div id="srp-search" class="sidebar-block sidebar-search xs-collapse">
	<h3>My Search</h3>

	<form class="refine-search">
		<div class="xs-hidden">
			<div class="search-filters">
				<div class="filter-category">
					<a href="#" class="category-remove pull-right">X</a>
					<span class="category-name">Make</span>
					<span class="filter"><a href="#" data-remove="filter">x</a> BMW</span>
				</div>

				<div class="filter-category">
					<a href="#" class="category-remove pull-right">X</a>
					<span class="category-name">Model</span>
					<span class="filter"><a href="#" data-remove="filter">x</a> 5 Series</span>
					<span class="filter"><a href="#" data-remove="filter">x</a> 3 Series</span>
				</div>

				<div class="filter-category">
					<a href="#" class="category-remove pull-right">X</a>
					<span class="category-name">Trim</span>
					<span class="filter"><a href="#" data-remove="filter">x</a> LX</span>
				</div>

				<div class="filter-category">
					<a href="#" class="category-remove pull-right">X</a>
					<span class="category-name">Year</span>
					<span class="filter"><a href="#" data-remove="filter">x</a> 2001–2014</span>
				</div>

				<div class="filter-category">
					<a href="#" class="category-remove pull-right">X</a>
					<span class="category-name">Mileage</span>

My Saved Searches Advanced Search

HTML

									
										<form id="quick-search" class="quick-search">
	
	<span class="heading-info xs-hidden" data-set="heading-info">
		<span class="rover">Vehicles Available <strong>100</strong></span>
	</span>
	<h2 class="large">Search Purchase History</h2>
	<span class="heading-info xs-visible" data-set="heading-info"></span>

	<div class="search-criteria xs-visible">
		<a href="#" class="search-field" data-sheet-toggle="make-sheet">
			Make
			<span class="filter">Nissan</span>
		</a>

					<a href="#">Advanced Search</a>
				</div>

				<div class="form-group col-sm-12 col-md-2">
				    <button class="btn">Search</button>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>

</form>

My Activity

This pattern contains: atoms-small-tables atoms-chart

HTML

									
										<h2 class="large">My Activity</h2>

<div class="row my-activity">

	<!-- activity section -->
	<div class="col-sm-6">
		<h3>
			Sales Activity (4)
			<a href="#" class="heading-link">View All</a>
		</h3>

		<div class="listing">
			<div class="row">
				<div class="vehicle-thumb col-sm-3">
					<img src="/img/vehicle-thumb.jpg" alt="Vehicle Thumb" />
				</div>

				<div class="listing-content col-sm-5">
					<a href="#" class="vehicle-name">2013 BMW 5 Series lx</a>
					<span class="vehicle-desc">blue</span>
					<span class="vehicle-desc">68,542 miles</span>
				</div>

				<div class="listing-meta col-sm-4">
					<span class="vehicle-cost">$57,875</span>

					<span class="bid-count"><strong>9</strong> bids</span>

				</div>
			</div>
		</div>

		<div class="listing">
			<div class="row">
				<div class="vehicle-thumb col-sm-3">

<!-- /activity row -->

<!-- activity row -->


<div class="row my-activity">

	<!-- activity section -->
	<div class="col-sm-6">
		<h3>
			Sales Channel Activity (4)
			<a href="#" class="heading-link">View All</a>
		</h3>

		<div class="activity-container">
			
			
			Hello world.

			<style>
			/* 
			  make each pie piece a rectangle twice as high as it is wide.
			  move the transform origin to the middle of the left side.
			  Also ensure that overflow is set to hidden.
			*/
			  .pie {
					position:absolute;
					width:100px;
					height:200px;
					overflow:hidden;
					left:150px;
					-moz-transform-origin:left center;
					-ms-transform-origin:left center;
					-o-transform-origin:left center;
					-webkit-transform-origin:left center;
					transform-origin:left center;
				}
			/*
			  unless the piece represents more than 50% of the whole chart.
			  then make it a square, and ensure the transform origin is
			  back in the center.

			  NOTE: since this is only ever a single piece, you could
			  move this to a piece specific rule and remove the extra class
			*/
				.pie.big {
					width:200px;
					height:200px;
					left:50px;
					-moz-transform-origin:center center;
					-ms-transform-origin:center center;
					-o-transform-origin:center center;
					-webkit-transform-origin:center center;
					transform-origin:center center;
				}
			/*
			  this is the actual visible part of the pie. 
			  Give it the same dimensions as the regular piece.
			  Use border radius make it a half circle.
			  move transform origin to the middle of the right side.
			  Push it out to the left of the containing box.
			*/
				.pie:BEFORE {
					content:"";
					position:absolute;
					width:100px;
					height:200px;
					left:-100px;
					border-radius:100px 0 0 100px;
					-moz-transform-origin:right center;
					-ms-transform-origin:right center;
					-o-transform-origin:right center;
					-webkit-transform-origin:right center;
					transform-origin:right center;
					
				}
			 /* if it's part of a big piece, bring it back into the square */
				.pie.big:BEFORE {
					left:0px;
				}
			/* 
			  big pieces will also need a second semicircle, pointed in the
			  opposite direction to hide the first part behind.
			*/
				.pie.big:AFTER {
					content:"";
					position:absolute;
					width:100px;
					height:200px;
					left:100px;
					border-radius:0 100px 100px 0;
				}
			/*
			  add colour to each piece.
			*/
				.pie:nth-of-type(1):BEFORE,
				.pie:nth-of-type(1):AFTER {
					background-color:blue;	
				}
				.pie:nth-of-type(2):AFTER,
				.pie:nth-of-type(2):BEFORE {
					background-color:green;	
				}
				.pie:nth-of-type(3):AFTER,
				.pie:nth-of-type(3):BEFORE {
					background-color:red;	
				}
				.pie:nth-of-type(4):AFTER,
				.pie:nth-of-type(4):BEFORE {
					background-color:orange;	
				}
			/*
			  now rotate each piece based on their cumulative starting
			  position
			*/
				.pie[data-start="30"] {
					-moz-transform: rotate(30deg); /* Firefox */
					-ms-transform: rotate(30deg); /* IE */
					-webkit-transform: rotate(30deg); /* Safari and Chrome */
					-o-transform: rotate(30deg); /* Opera */
					transform:rotate(30deg);
				}
				.pie[data-start="60"] {
					-moz-transform: rotate(60deg); /* Firefox */
					-ms-transform: rotate(60deg); /* IE */
					-webkit-transform: rotate(60deg); /* Safari and Chrome */
					-o-transform: rotate(60deg); /* Opera */
					transform:rotate(60deg);
				}
				.pie[data-start="100"] {
					-moz-transform: rotate(100deg); /* Firefox */
					-ms-transform: rotate(100deg); /* IE */
					-webkit-transform: rotate(100deg); /* Safari and Chrome */
					-o-transform: rotate(100deg); /* Opera */
					transform:rotate(100deg);
				}
			/*
			  and rotate the amount of the pie that's showing.

			  NOTE: add an extra degree to all but the final piece, 
			  to fill in unsightly gaps.
			*/
				.pie[data-value="30"]:BEFORE {
					-moz-transform: rotate(31deg); /* Firefox */
					-ms-transform: rotate(31deg); /* IE */
					-webkit-transform: rotate(31deg); /* Safari and Chrome */
					-o-transform: rotate(31deg); /* Opera */
					transform:rotate(31deg);
				}
				.pie[data-value="40"]:BEFORE {
					-moz-transform: rotate(41deg); /* Firefox */
					-ms-transform: rotate(41deg); /* IE */
					-webkit-transform: rotate(41deg); /* Safari and Chrome */
					-o-transform: rotate(41deg); /* Opera */
					transform:rotate(41deg);
				}
				.pie[data-value="260"]:BEFORE {
					-moz-transform: rotate(260deg); /* Firefox */
					-ms-transform: rotate(260deg); /* IE */
					-webkit-transform: rotate(260deg); /* Safari and Chrome */
					-o-transform: rotate(260deg); /* Opera */
					transform:rotate(260deg);
				}
			/*
			NOTE: you could also apply custom classes (i.e. .s0 .v30)
			but if the CSS3 attr() function proposal ever gets implemented,
			then all the above custom piece rules could be replaced with
			the following:

			.pie[data-start] {
			   transform:rotate(attr(data-start,deg,0);
			}
			.pie[data-value]:BEFORE {
			   transform:rotate(attr(data-value,deg,0);
			}
			*/

			</style>

			<!-- 
			for each piece of the pie chart create one div and give it
			a data-value attribute that represents the amount (in degrees) that
			represents its total visible portion, and a data-start attribute
			that matches the amount rotation for the starting  (the cumulative value amount of all the previous pieces).

			 
			-->
			<div class="pie" data-start="0" data-value="30"></div>
			<div class="pie highlight" data-start="30" data-value="30"></div>
			<div class="pie" data-start="60" data-value="40"></div>
			<div class="pie big" data-start="100" data-value="260"></div>
			
		</div>

	</div>
	<!-- /activity section -->
	
	<!-- activity section -->

	<div class="col-sm-6">
		<h3>
			Vehicles For Sale (2)
			<a href="#" class="heading-link">View All</a>
		</h3>

		<div class="listing">
			<div class="row">
				<div class="vehicle-thumb col-sm-3">
					<img src="/img/vehicle-thumb.jpg" alt="Vehicle Thumb" />
				</div>

				<div class="listing-content col-sm-5">
					<a href="#" class="vehicle-name">2013 BMW 5 Series lx</a>
					<span class="vehicle-desc">blue</span>
					<span class="vehicle-desc">68,542 miles</span>
				</div>

				<div class="listing-meta col-sm-4">
					<span class="vehicle-cost">$57,875</span>
					<span class="buy-it-now-price"><strong>Buy It Now Price:</strong> $75,000</span>
					<span class="bid-count"><strong>9</strong> bids</span>
					<span class="time-left">57m, 37s left</span>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>

		<div class="listing">
			<div class="row">
				<div class="vehicle-thumb col-sm-3">
					<img src="/img/vehicle-thumb.jpg" alt="Vehicle Thumb" />
				</div>

				<div class="listing-content col-sm-5">
					<a href="#" class="vehicle-name">2013 BMW 5 Series lx</a>
					<span class="vehicle-desc">blue</span>
					<span class="vehicle-desc">68,542 miles</span>
				</div>

				<div class="listing-meta col-sm-4">
					<span class="vehicle-cost">$57,875</span>
					<span class="bid-count"><strong>9</strong> bids</span>
					<span class="time-left">57m, 37s left</span>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
	<!-- /activity section -->
	

</div>

<!-- /activity row -->

HTML

									
										<div class="xs-hidden">
	<h3>Ground a Vehicle</h3>

	<form id="quick-ground-form" class="quick-ground-form validate-form">
		<div class="form-group text">
		    <label class="control-label" for="qg-vin">Enter VIN</label>
		    <input class="form-control" id="qg-vin" name="qg-vin" type="text" placeholder="VIN #" required>
		</div>

		<div class="form-group">
		    <button class="btn">Ground This Vehicle</button>
		</div>
		
	</form>
</div>

My Activity

My Current Bids

Once you add bids on vehicles, they will appear here.

My Watch List

Once you add vehicles to your watch list, they will appear here.

HTML

									
										<h2 class="large">My Activity</h2>
<div class="row">
	<div class="col-sm-6">
		<h3>
			My Current Bids
		</h3>

		<div class="listing">
			<div class="row">
				<div class="vehicle-thumb col-sm-3">
					<img src="/img/no-activity.jpg" alt="No Activity" />
				</div>

				<div class="listing-content no-activity col-md-7 col-sm-8">
					<span class="vehicle-desc">Once you add bids on vehicles, they will appear here.</span>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>

	<div class="col-sm-6">
		<h3>
			My Watch List
		</h3>

		<div class="listing">
			<div class="row">
				<div class="vehicle-thumb col-sm-3">
					<img src="/img/no-activity.jpg" alt="No Activity" />
				</div>

				<div class="listing-content no-activity col-md-7 col-sm-8">

Listing

Announcements

Frame Damage:

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Maecenas commodo, nibh a finibus tincidunt, magna risus lacinia enim, vel tempus dui metus ultricies nisl. 			</dl>

				<dt>Severity:</dt>
				<dd>GR 12"</dd>
			</dl>
		</div>
	</div>
</section>

Vdp Seller Disclaimer

Seller Disclaimer

Toyota/Lexus Financial Services makes no guaranty that any manufacturer service campaign or recall work has been undertaken or performed on vehicles sold at auction. All dealers are encouraged to inspect vehicles prior to purchase and to perform any service campaigns or recalls repairs (and to perform any state mandated smog or safety checks) prior to resale of the vehicle. Toyota/Lexus Financial Services makes no guaranty that any manufacturer service campaign or recall work has been undertaken or performed on vehicles sold at auction. All dealers are encouraged to inspect vehicles prior to purchase and to perform any service campaigns or recalls repairs (and to perform any state mandated smog or safety checks) prior to resale of the vehicle.

HTML

									
										<section class="vdp-section seller-disclaimer">
	<h2>Seller Disclaimer</h2>

	<div class="info">
		<p>Toyota/Lexus Financial Services makes no guaranty that any manufacturer service campaign or recall work has been undertaken or performed on vehicles sold at auction. All dealers are encouraged to inspect vehicles prior to purchase and to perform any service campaigns or recalls repairs (and to perform any state mandated smog or safety checks) prior to resale of the vehicle. Toyota/Lexus Financial Services makes no guaranty that any manufacturer service campaign or recall work has been undertaken or performed on vehicles sold at auction. All dealers are encouraged to inspect vehicles prior to purchase and to perform any service campaigns or recalls repairs (and to perform any state mandated smog or safety checks) prior to resale of the vehicle.</p>
	</div>
</section>

Vdp Build Data

Build Data

Included Packages

Sport Line

  • Wheels: 18 x 8 Double-Spoke
  • Without Lines Designation Outside
  • High Gloss Black Trim
  • Anthracite Headliner
  • Black Door Mirror Caps
  • Sport Seats
  • Matte Coral Red Headlight Trim Finishers
  • Remove Increased Top Speed

Premium Package

  • Comfort Access Keyless Entry
  • Satellite Radio
  • Lumbar Support
  • Dakota Leather Upholstry

Navigation System

  • BMW Online & BMW Apps
  • Remote Services
  • Advanced Real-time Traffic Information
  • Instrument Cluster With Extended Contents

Driver Assistance Package

  • Rear View Camera
  • Park Distance Control

Additional Options

  • Heated Front Seats

Terms Block

This Enrollment Form may only be submitted by an authorized representative of your dealership (Aristocrat Motors). By submitting this Enrollment Form, you are certifying to RMS Automotive, LLC and any affiliate or service provider acting on its behalf (each, a “Payment Facilitator”) that you are an authorized representative of Dealer, and that the authorizations and agreements below are being made in your representative capacity for and on behalf of Dealer.

By clicking on the “Submit” button below, Dealer hereby:

1. Authorizes any Payment Facilitator to initiate electronic credit and debit entries to or from Dealer’s checking account designated below (“Electronic Transactions”) for the purpose of administering or facilitating any online vehicle transaction, include any purchase or sale transaction, or any unwind, refund or other reversal resulting from any vehicle arbitration (each, an “Online Vehicle Transaction”); and

2. Agrees to the Terms and Conditions for Electronic Transactions, which include additional terms and conditions applicable to Dealer and Electronic Transactions generally.

Dealer understands that it is expressly authorizing and directing the Payment Facilitator to initiate Electronic Transactions at any time for any amounts that Dealer may owe or be owed in connection with any Online Vehicle Transaction (including for any fees or expenses that Dealer may owe). The authorizations and agreements provided above and the Terms and Conditions for Electronic Transactions are legally binding. Please review them carefully prior to submission.

HTML

									
										<div class="terms-block">
	<p>This Enrollment Form may only be submitted by an authorized representative of your dealership (Aristocrat Motors). By submitting this Enrollment Form, you are certifying to RMS Automotive, LLC and any affiliate or service provider acting on its behalf (each, a “Payment Facilitator”) that you are an authorized representative of Dealer, and that the authorizations and agreements below are being made in your representative capacity for and on behalf of Dealer.</p>

	<p>By clicking on the “Submit” button below, Dealer hereby:</p>

	<p>1.	Authorizes any Payment Facilitator to initiate electronic credit and debit entries to or from Dealer’s checking account designated below (“Electronic Transactions”) for the purpose of administering or facilitating any online vehicle transaction, include any purchase or sale transaction, or any unwind, refund or other reversal resulting from any vehicle arbitration (each, an “Online Vehicle Transaction”); and</p>

	<p>2.	Agrees to the Terms and Conditions for Electronic Transactions, which include additional terms and conditions applicable to Dealer and Electronic Transactions generally.</p>

	<p>Dealer understands that it is expressly authorizing and directing the Payment Facilitator to initiate Electronic Transactions at any time for any amounts that Dealer may owe or be owed in connection with any Online Vehicle Transaction (including for any fees or expenses that Dealer may owe). The authorizations and agreements provided above and the Terms and Conditions for Electronic Transactions are legally binding. Please review them carefully prior to submission.</p>
</div>

Terms Modal

X

Terms and Conditions

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Vestibulum elit velit, lobortis id accumsan lacinia, condimentum tempus nunc. Duis iaculis nibh nec libero porttitor, ut lacinia metus laoreet. Praesent tempor laoreet ante, vitae eleifend sem hendrerit ac. Aenean eros sapien, molestie vel ante quis, lacinia venenatis leo. Phasellus accumsan eros id rutrum rutrum. Etiam rutrum felis nisl, id volutpat ipsum sodales quis. Pellentesque nec pharetra libero. Cras venenatis dolor eget sapien dapibus, id blandit justo aliquet. Morbi porta dui id erat pellentesque tincidunt sed vitae leo. Suspendisse ultrices interdum maximus. Aliquam ut massa dapibus nunc scelerisque tincidunt. Suspendisse accumsan felis ac augue fringilla facilisis. Praesent dictum nunc ipsum, eu cursus sem bibendum a.

Mauris et sollicitudin nulla, et consectetur mauris. Sed et viverra quam. Curabitur dapibus non eros quis porta. Curabitur felis augue, ullamcorper at lacus et, dictum cursus metus. Donec felis nisi, venenatis vel viverra dapibus, iaculis eget erat. In hac habitasse platea dictumst. Mauris ornare ligula quam, nec fringilla metus hendrerit sed. Vestibulum id dui orci. Nullam diam sem, ultrices sit amet convallis et, consequat a orci. Quisque molestie mauris in velit tempus, a ornare magna aliquam. Fusce ornare nunc vel sem consequat, id elementum ipsum fringilla. Pellentesque tempor turpis ac sagittis congue.

HTML

									
										<div class="modal fade print-hidden" id="terms-modal" data-xs-sheet="terms-sheet">
	<div class="modal-dialog">
		<div class="modal-content">
			<div class="modal-header">
				<button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close"><span aria-hidden="true">X</span></button>
			</div>
			
			<div class="modal-body terms-modal">
				<a href="#" class="close xs-visible" data-sheet-toggle="terms-sheet">X</a>
				<h2>Terms and Conditions</h2>

				<p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Vestibulum elit velit, lobortis id accumsan lacinia, condimentum tempus nunc. Duis iaculis nibh nec libero porttitor, ut lacinia metus laoreet. Praesent tempor laoreet ante, vitae eleifend sem hendrerit ac. Aenean eros sapien, molestie vel ante quis, lacinia venenatis leo. Aliquam ut massa dapibus nunc scelerisque tincidunt. Suspendisse accumsan felis ac augue fringilla facilisis. Praesent dictum nunc ipsum, eu cursus sem bibendum a.</p>

				<p>Mauris et sollicitudin nulla, et consectetur mauris. Sed et viverra quam. Curabitur dapibus non eros quis porta. Curabitur felis augue, ullamcorper at lacus et, dictum cursus metus. Donec felis nisi, venenatis vel viverra dapibus, iaculis eget erat. In hac habitasse platea dictumst. Mauris ornare ligula quam, nec fringilla metus hendrerit sed. Vestibulum id dui orci. Nullam diam sem, ultrices sit amet convallis et, consequat a orci. Quisque molestie mauris in velit tempus, a ornare magna aliquam. Fusce ornare nunc vel sem consequat, id elementum ipsum fringilla. Add Location Modal

X

Add a Location

Done

HTML

									
										<div class="modal fade" id="add-location-modal" data-xs-sheet="add-location-sheet">
	<div class="modal-dialog">
		<div class="modal-content">
			<div class="modal-header">
				<button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close"><span aria-hidden="true">X</span></button>
			</div>
			
			<div class="modal-body">
				<a href="#" class="close xs-visible" data-sheet-toggle="add-location-sheet">X</a>
				<h2>Add a Location</h2>

				<div class="row">
					<div class="form-group text col-xs-12">
						<label class="control-label" for="loc-address-1">Address <sup title="Required">*</sup></label>
						<input type="text" class="form-control" id="loc-address-1" name="loc-address-1" required>
					</div>

					<div class="form-group text col-xs-12">
						<label class="control-label" for="loc-address-2">Address 2</label>
						<input type="text" class="form-control" id="loc-address-2" name="loc-address-2">
					</div>
				</div>

				<div class="row">
					<div class="form-group text col-sm-5">
						<label class="control-label" for="loc-city">City <sup title="Required">*</sup></label>
						<input type="text" class="form-control" id="loc-city" name="loc-city" data-error-message="Required." required>
					</div>

					<div class="form-group select col-xs-6 col-sm-4">
						<label class="control-label" for="loc-state">State <sup title="Required">*</sup></label>
						<select class="form-control required" id="loc-state" name="loc-state" data-error-message="Required.">
							<option value>Select</option>
							<option value="AL">Alabama</option>
							<option value="AK">Alaska</option>
							<option value="AR">Arkansas</option>
							<option>Others</option>
						</select>
					</div>

					<div class="form-group text col-xs-6 col-sm-3">
						<label class="control-label" for="loc-zip">Zip <sup title="Required">*</sup></label>
						<input type="text" class="form-control" id="loc-zip" name="loc-zip" data-error-message="Required." required>
					</div>
				</div>

				<div class="row">
					<div class="form-group col-xs-12">
					   	<label class="control-label">Radio Buttons</label>
					   	<div class="radio-group">
						   	<input type="radio" id="loc-save-yes" name="loc-save" checked="checked" />
						   	<label for="loc-save-yes">Save and Add to my Locations</label>

							<input type="radio" id="loc-save-no" name="loc-save" />
							<label for="loc-save-no">Save and do Not Add to my Locations</label>
						</div>
					</div>
				</div>

				<div class="row">
					<div class="form-group col-sm-3 col-sm-offset-9">
					   	<a href="#" class="btn" data-dismiss="modal" data-sheet-toggle="add-location-sheet" aria-label="Close">Done</a>
					</div>
				</div>

			</div>
		</div><!-- /.modal-content -->
	</div><!-- /.modal-dialog -->
</div><!-- /.modal -->

    </div>

1234567890ABCDEFG

01/22/2015

Atlanta, GA 30312
Grade:

	<h3>Vehicle Details</h3>

	<div class="alert alert-danger">
		This is not a mandatory vehicle for grounding dealer.
	</div>

		<span class="vehicle-cost">$57,875</span>

	</div>

Terms and Conditions

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Vestibulum elit velit, lobortis id accumsan lacinia, condimentum tempus nunc. Duis iaculis nibh nec libero porttitor, ut lacinia metus laoreet. Praesent tempor laoreet ante, vitae eleifend sem hendrerit ac. Aenean eros sapien, molestie vel ante quis, lacinia venenatis leo. Phasellus accumsan eros id rutrum rutrum. Etiam rutrum felis nisl, id volutpat ipsum sodales quis. Pellentesque nec pharetra libero. Cras venenatis dolor eget sapien dapibus, id blandit justo aliquet. Morbi porta dui id erat pellentesque tincidunt sed vitae leo. Suspendisse ultrices interdum maximus. Aliquam ut massa dapibus nunc scelerisque tincidunt. Suspendisse accumsan felis ac augue fringilla facilisis. Praesent dictum nunc ipsum, eu cursus sem bibendum a.

Mauris et sollicitudin nulla, et consectetur mauris. Sed et viverra quam. Curabitur dapibus non eros quis porta. Curabitur felis augue, ullamcorper at lacus et, dictum cursus metus. Donec felis nisi, venenatis vel viverra dapibus, iaculis eget erat. In hac habitasse platea dictumst. Mauris ornare ligula quam, nec fringilla metus hendrerit sed. Vestibulum id dui orci. Nullam diam sem, ultrices sit amet convallis et, consequat a orci. Quisque molestie mauris in velit tempus, a ornare magna aliquam. Fusce ornare nunc vel sem consequat, id elementum ipsum fringilla. Pellentesque tempor turpis ac sagittis congue.

This pattern contains: molecules-footer-nav molecules-footer-sub-nav

HTML

	<div class="container">
		<div class="row">
			<div class="col-sm-9 main-footer-nav">

Terms and Conditions

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Vestibulum elit velit, lobortis id accumsan lacinia, condimentum tempus nunc. Duis iaculis nibh nec libero porttitor, ut lacinia metus laoreet. Praesent tempor laoreet ante, vitae eleifend sem hendrerit ac. Aenean eros sapien, molestie vel ante quis, lacinia venenatis leo. Phasellus accumsan eros id rutrum rutrum. Etiam rutrum felis nisl, id volutpat ipsum sodales quis. Pellentesque nec pharetra libero. Cras venenatis dolor eget sapien dapibus, id blandit justo aliquet. Morbi porta dui id erat pellentesque tincidunt sed vitae leo. Suspendisse ultrices interdum maximus. Aliquam ut massa dapibus nunc scelerisque tincidunt. Suspendisse accumsan felis ac augue fringilla facilisis. Praesent dictum nunc ipsum, eu cursus sem bibendum a.

Mauris et sollicitudin nulla, et consectetur mauris. Sed et viverra quam. Curabitur dapibus non eros quis porta. Curabitur felis augue, ullamcorper at lacus et, dictum cursus metus. HTML

									
										<div class="listings srp-listings">
	<div class="listing large-listing">
		<div class="xs-visible" data-set="srp-vehicle-name-1"></div>
		<div class="row">
			<div class="vehicle-thumb col-sm-3">
				<img src="/img/srp-vehicle-thumb.jpg" alt="Vehicle Thumb" />
			</div>

		<div class="col-sm-6">
			<div class="form-group offset-top">
				<label class="control-label label-horizontal">Format</label>
				<div class="radio-group radio-inline">
					<input type="radio" id="radio-delta" name="radio-group-beta" checked="checked" />
					<label for="radio-delta">HTML</label>

					<input type="radio" id="radio-epsilon" name="radio-group-beta" />
					<label for="radio-epsilon">Text</label>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>

		<div class="col-sm-4 col-sm-offset-2">
			<div class="form-group offset-top">
				<button class="btn">Save</button>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</form>'>Edit Notifications</a>
				</div>
			</div>

			<div class="col-sm-5 col-md-4">
				<div class="vehicle-stats">
					<p>Searches for the following criteria:</p>
					<div class="row">
						<dl class="col-sm-6">
							<dt>Model:</dt>
							<dd>525i, 528i, M5</dd>

							<dt>Year:</dt>
							<dd>2010–2014</dd>

							<dt>Mileage:</dt>
							<dd>< 20,000</dd>
						</dl>

						<dl class="col-sm-6">
							<dt>Color:</dt>
							<dd>Blue, Cobalt</dd>
						</dl>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>

		<a href="#" class="delete-listing">X</a>

		<div class="save-search xs-hidden" data-set="save-search-3">
			<a href="#" class="btn rover">Search Now</a>
		</div>
	</div>

	<div class="listing saved-search">
		<div class="row">
			<div class="col-sm-4">
				<a href="#" class="search-name">2013 BMW 5 Series lx</a>

				<div class="save-search xs-visible" data-set="save-search-4"></div>

				<div class="alt-links left">
					<a href="#" data-toggle="popover" data-placement="bottom" data-content='<form class="search-name-popover validate-form">
	<a href="#" class="popover-cancel pull-right">X</a>
	<h3>Edit Search Name</h3>

	<div class="form-group text">
    	<label class="control-label">Enter name for this search <sup title="Required">*</sup></label>
    	<input class="form-control" id="smp-name" name="smp-name" type="text" value="2013BMW 5 Series lx" required>
    </div>

	<div class="row">
		<div class="col-sm-4 col-sm-offset-8">
			<div class="form-group">
				<button class="btn">Save</button>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</form>'>Edit Search Name</a>
					<a href="#" data-toggle="popover" data-placement="bottom" data-content='<form class="notifications-popover validate-form">
	<a href="#" class="popover-cancel pull-right">X</a>
	<h3>Add Notifications</h3>
	<div class="form-horizontal">
		<div class="form-group text">
		   	<div class="col-sm-5">
		    	<label class="control-label">Email This Search To <sup title="Required">*</sup></label>
	    	</div>
		    
		    <div class="col-sm-7">
			    <input class="form-control email" id="np-email" name="np-email" type="text" value="real.address@email.com" required data-error-placement="after">
		    </div>
		</div>
	</div>

	<div class="row">
		<div class="col-sm-4">
			<div class="form-group select">
				<label class="control-label" for="select">Send</label>
				<select class="form-control" id="select" name="select">
					<option>Weekly</option>
				</select>
			</div>
		</div>

			<div class="form-group select">
				<label class="control-label" for="select">On</label>
				<select class="form-control" id="select" name="select">
					<option>Monday</option>
				</select>
			</div>
		</div>

		<div class="col-sm-4">
			<div class="form-group select">
				<label class="control-label" for="select">For</label>
				<select class="form-control" id="select" name="select">
					<option>1 Week</option>
				</select>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>

	<div class="row">
		<div class="col-sm-6">
			<div class="form-group offset-top">
				<label class="control-label label-horizontal">Format</label>
				<div class="radio-group radio-inline">
					<input type="radio" id="radio-delta" name="radio-group-beta" checked="checked" />
					<label for="radio-delta">HTML</label>

					<input type="radio" id="radio-epsilon" name="radio-group-beta" />
					<label for="radio-epsilon">Text</label>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>

		<div class="col-sm-4 col-sm-offset-2">
			<div class="form-group offset-top">
				<button class="btn">Save</button>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</form>'>Edit Notifications</a>
				</div>
			</div>

			<div class="col-sm-5 col-md-4">
				<div class="vehicle-stats">
					<p>Searches for the following criteria:</p>
					<div class="row">
						<dl class="col-sm-6">

				</div>
			</div>
		</div>

		</div>
	</div>
</div>

	<!-- activity row -->


	<div class="row my-activity">

		<!-- activity section -->
		<div class="col-sm-6">
			<h3>
				Sales Channel Activity (4)
				<a href="#" class="heading-link">View All</a>
			</h3>

			<div class="activity-container">
				
				
			Hello world.

			<style>
			/* 
			  make each pie piece a rectangle twice as high as it is wide.
			  move the transform origin to the middle of the left side.
			  Also ensure that overflow is set to hidden.
			*/
			  .pie {
					position:absolute;
					width:100px;
					height:200px;
					overflow:hidden;
					left:150px;
					-moz-transform-origin:left center;
					-ms-transform-origin:left center;
					-o-transform-origin:left center;
					-webkit-transform-origin:left center;
					transform-origin:left center;
				}
			/*
			  unless the piece represents more than 50% of the whole chart.
			  then make it a square, and ensure the transform origin is
			  back in the center.

			  NOTE: since this is only ever a single piece, you could
			  move this to a piece specific rule and remove the extra class
			*/
				.pie.big {
					width:200px;
					height:200px;
					left:50px;
					-moz-transform-origin:center center;
					-ms-transform-origin:center center;
					-o-transform-origin:center center;
					-webkit-transform-origin:center center;
					transform-origin:center center;
				}
			/*
			  this is the actual visible part of the pie. 
			  Give it the same dimensions as the regular piece.
			  Use border radius make it a half circle.
			  move transform origin to the middle of the right side.
			  Push it out to the left of the containing box.
			*/
				.pie:BEFORE {
					content:"";
					position:absolute;
					width:100px;
					height:200px;
					left:-100px;
					border-radius:100px 0 0 100px;
					-moz-transform-origin:right center;
					-ms-transform-origin:right center;
					-o-transform-origin:right center;
					-webkit-transform-origin:right center;
					transform-origin:right center;
					
				}
			 /* if it's part of a big piece, bring it back into the square */
				.pie.big:BEFORE {
					left:0px;
				}
			/* 
			  big pieces will also need a second semicircle, pointed in the
			  opposite direction to hide the first part behind.
			*/
				.pie.big:AFTER {
					content:"";
					position:absolute;
					width:100px;
					height:200px;
					left:100px;
					border-radius:0 100px 100px 0;
				}
			/*
			  add colour to each piece.
			*/
				.pie:nth-of-type(1):BEFORE,
				.pie:nth-of-type(1):AFTER {
					background-color:blue;	
				}
				.pie:nth-of-type(2):AFTER,
				.pie:nth-of-type(2):BEFORE {
					background-color:green;	
				}
				.pie:nth-of-type(3):AFTER,
				.pie:nth-of-type(3):BEFORE {
					background-color:red;	
				}
				.pie:nth-of-type(4):AFTER,
				.pie:nth-of-type(4):BEFORE {
					background-color:orange;	
				}
			/*
			  now rotate each piece based on their cumulative starting
			  position
			*/
				.pie[data-start="30"] {
					-moz-transform: rotate(30deg); /* Firefox */
					-ms-transform: rotate(30deg); /* IE */
					-webkit-transform: rotate(30deg); /* Safari and Chrome */
					-o-transform: rotate(30deg); /* Opera */
					transform:rotate(30deg);
				}
				.pie[data-start="60"] {
					-moz-transform: rotate(60deg); /* Firefox */
					-ms-transform: rotate(60deg); /* IE */
					-webkit-transform: rotate(60deg); /* Safari and Chrome */
					-o-transform: rotate(60deg); /* Opera */
					transform:rotate(60deg);
				}
				.pie[data-start="100"] {
					-moz-transform: rotate(100deg); /* Firefox */
					-ms-transform: rotate(100deg); /* IE */
					-webkit-transform: rotate(100deg); /* Safari and Chrome */
					-o-transform: rotate(100deg); /* Opera */
					transform:rotate(100deg);
				}
			/*
			  and rotate the amount of the pie that's showing.

			  NOTE: add an extra degree to all but the final piece, 
			  to fill in unsightly gaps.
			*/
				.pie[data-value="30"]:BEFORE {
					-moz-transform: rotate(31deg); /* Firefox */
					-ms-transform: rotate(31deg); /* IE */
					-webkit-transform: rotate(31deg); /* Safari and Chrome */
					-o-transform: rotate(31deg); /* Opera */
					transform:rotate(31deg);
				}
				.pie[data-value="40"]:BEFORE {
					-moz-transform: rotate(41deg); /* Firefox */
					-ms-transform: rotate(41deg); /* IE */
					-webkit-transform: rotate(41deg); /* Safari and Chrome */
					-o-transform: rotate(41deg); /* Opera */
					transform:rotate(41deg);
				}
				.pie[data-value="260"]:BEFORE {
					-moz-transform: rotate(260deg); /* Firefox */
					-ms-transform: rotate(260deg); /* IE */
					-webkit-transform: rotate(260deg); /* Safari and Chrome */
					-o-transform: rotate(260deg); /* Opera */
					transform:rotate(260deg);
				}
			/*
			NOTE: you could also apply custom classes (i.e. .s0 .v30)
			but if the CSS3 attr() function proposal ever gets implemented,
			then all the above custom piece rules could be replaced with
			the following:

			.pie[data-start] {
			   transform:rotate(attr(data-start,deg,0);
			}
			.pie[data-value]:BEFORE {
			   transform:rotate(attr(data-value,deg,0);
			}
			*/

			</style>

			<!-- 
			for each piece of the pie chart create one div and give it
			a data-value attribute that represents the amount (in degrees) that
			represents its total visible portion, and a data-start attribute
			that matches the amount rotation for the starting  (the cumulative value amount of all the previous pieces).

			 
			-->
			<div class="pie" data-start="0" data-value="30"></div>
			<div class="pie highlight" data-start="30" data-value="30"></div>
			<div class="pie" data-start="60" data-value="40"></div>
			<div class="pie big" data-start="100" data-value="260"></div>
				
			</div>

		</div>
		<!-- /activity section -->
		
		<!-- activity section -->

		<div class="col-sm-6">
			<h3>
				Vehicles For Sale (2)
				<a href="#" class="heading-link">View All</a>
			</h3>

				<div class="row">

					</div>

HTML

									
										<section class="container" role="main">
	<form id="advanced-search-form" class="advanced-search-form validate-form">
		<header>
			<span class="heading-info xs-hidden" data-set="heading-info">
				<span class="rover">Vehicles Available <strong>100</strong></span>
			</span>
			<h1>Search Vehicles</h1>
			<span class="heading-info xs-visible" data-set="heading-info"></span>
		</header>

		<div class="top-actions">
			<div class="row">
				<div class="alt-links left col-sm-9 col-md-10">
					<a href="#">Saved Searches</a>
					<a href="#">Save This Search</a>
					<a href="#">Clear All <span class="xs-hidden">Search Filters</span></a>
				</div>
				
				<div class="col-sm-3 col-sm-offset-9 col-md-2 col-md-offset-10">
					<button class="btn">Search</button>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>

		<div class="search-section">
			<h2>VIN Number</h2>

			<div class="row">
				<div class="form-group col-sm-9 col-md-10">
					<label class="control-label" for="as-vin">Enter VIN</label>
					<input type="text" class="form-control" id="as-vin" name="as-vin" placeholder="VIN #">
				</div>

				<div class="form-group button col-sm-3 col-md-2">
					<button id="vin-search" class="btn">Search VIN</button>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>

		<div class="search-section">
			<h2>Basic Details</h2>

			<div class="search-criteria xs-visible">
				<a href="#" class="search-field" data-sheet-toggle="make-sheet">
					Make
					<span class="filter">BMW</span>
				</a>
				<a href="#" class="search-field" data-sheet-toggle="model-sheet">
					Model
					<span class="filter">5 Series</span>
				</a>
				<a href="#" class="search-field" data-sheet-toggle="trim-sheet">Trim</a>
				<a href="#" class="search-field" data-sheet-toggle="year-sheet">Year</a>
				<a href="#" class="search-field" data-sheet-toggle="mileage-sheet">Odometer</a>
				<a href="#" class="search-field" data-sheet-toggle="price-sheet">Price Range</a>
			</div>

			<div class="form-group" data-xs-sheet="make-sheet">

		<div class="search-section divided-fields">
			<h2>Sale Info</h2>

			<div class="search-criteria xs-visible">
				<a href="#" class="search-field" data-sheet-toggle="sale-type-sheet">Sale Type</a>

			<div class="row">
				<div class="form-group col-sm-12 col-md-8" data-xs-sheet="sale-type-sheet">

Seller Disclaimer

Toyota/Lexus Financial Services makes no guaranty that any manufacturer service campaign or recall work has been undertaken or performed on vehicles sold at auction. All dealers are encouraged to inspect vehicles prior to purchase and to perform any service campaigns or recalls repairs (and to perform any state mandated smog or safety checks) prior to resale of the vehicle. All dealers are encouraged to inspect vehicles prior to purchase and to perform any service campaigns or recalls repairs (and to perform any state mandated smog or safety checks) prior to resale of the vehicle.

					<dt>Severity:</dt>
					<dd>GR 12"</dd>
				</dl>
			</div>

			<div class="row">
				<div class="col-sm-2 damage-thumb">
					<img src="/img/vdp-thumb.jpg" alt="Photo of damage" />
				</div>

				<dl class="col-xs-6 col-sm-3">
					<dt>Description:</dt>
					<dd>Rear Bumper Cover</dd>
				</dl>

				<dl class="col-xs-6 col-sm-3">
					<dt>Condition:</dt>
					<dd>Curb Rash</dd>
				</dl>

				<dl class="col-xs-6 col-sm-3">
					<dt>Severity:</dt>
					<dd>GR 12"</dd>
				</dl>
			</div>
		</div>
	</section>
	<section class="vdp-section tires-wheels">
		<h2>Tires & Wheels</h2>

		<div class="row tire-specs">
			<dl class="col-xs-6 col-sm-2">

			</div>
		</div>

						<label class="control-label" for="bin-delivery-type">Delivery Type</label>
						<select class="form-control" id="bin-delivery-type" name="bin-delivery-type">
							<option>Dealer Location</option>
						</select>
					</div>

					<div class="form-group select col-sm-6">

						<select class="form-control" id="bin-delivery-method" name="bin-delivery-method">

						</select>
					</div>
				</div>

					<label class="control-label" for="bin-delivery-location">Delivery Location</label>

						<option>Hometown Autos, GA 30312</option>
						<option value="other">Other</option>
					</select>
				</div>			</div>

					<div class="input-group adjust-group">
						<div class="input-group-addon">$</div>
						<input class="form-control" id="ib-bid" name="ib-bid" type="text" value="57,975" data-atd-increment="100" pattern="\d*">

							<a href="#" class="btn" data-atd-increment-up="ib-bid">▲</a>

						</div>
					</div>
					<small>$57,975 or higher (Increment: $100)</small>				</div>

					<dd>$210</dd>

					<dd>Rear Bumper Cover</dd>
				</dl>

				<dl class="col-xs-6 col-sm-3">
					<dt>Condition:</dt>
					<dd>Curb Rash</dd>
				</dl>

				<dl class="col-xs-6 col-sm-3">
					<dt>Severity:</dt>
					<dd>GR 12"</dd>
				</dl>
			</div>
		</div>
	</section>
</section>

Account Settings

Account Settings

The payment and transportation selects made on this screen will be used as default selections for all vehicle purchases made in the system.

Default Payment Method Options

Edit payment method

Default Delivery Options

Add a location

Bidding Profile

Cancel

HTML

									
										<section class="container" role="main">
	<h1>Account Settings</h1>

	<p>The payment and transportation selects made on this screen will be used as default selections for all vehicle purchases made in the system.</p>
	
	<form id="account-settings-form" class="account-settings-form">
		<h2>Default Payment Method Options</h2>

	
		<div class="row">
			<div class="form-group select col-sm-6">
				<div class="alt-links pull-right above">
					<a href="#">Edit payment method</a>
				</div>
				<label class="control-label" for="pm-method">Payment Method</label>
				<select class="form-control" id="pm-method" name="pm-method">
					<option>ACH</option>
				</select>
			</div>
		</div>

		<h2>Default Delivery Options</h2>

		<div class="row">
			<div class="form-group select col-sm-6 col-md-3">
				<label class="control-label" for="do-provider">Transportation Provider</label>
				<select class="form-control" id="do-provider" name="do-provider">
					<option>Ready Auto</option>
				</select>
			</div>

			<div class="form-group select col-sm-6 col-md-3">
				<label class="control-label" for="do-type">Default Delivery Type</label>
				<select class="form-control" id="do-type" name="do-type">
					<option>Buyer Location</option>
				</select>
			</div>

			<div class="form-group select col-sm-12 col-md-6">
				<div class="alt-links pull-right above">
					<a href="#">Add a location</a>
				</div>
				<label class="control-label" for="do-location">Payment Method</label>
				<select class="form-control" id="do-location" name="do-location">
					<option>Hometown Autos, 123 Street St, Atlanta, GA 30312</option>
				</select>
			</div>
		</div>
		
		<h2>Bidding Profile</h2>

		<div class="row">

			<div class="col-sm-12">
				<div class="form-group">
					<label class="control-label">Match Reserve</label>
					<div class="checkbox-group">
						<input type="checkbox" id="mp-match-reserve" name="mp-match-reserve" checked="checked" />
						<label for="mp-match-reserve">Match to reserve if maximum bid is greater than reserve price </label>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>

		<div class="bottom-actions">
			<div class="row">
				<div class="col-xs-6 col-sm-5 col-sm-offset-4 col-md-4 col-md-offset-6">
					<a href="#" class="btn btn-cancel">Cancel</a>
				</div>

				<div class="col-xs-6 col-sm-3 col-md-2">
					<button class="btn">Submit</button>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>

	</form>

</section>

		</div>
	</form>

Payment Information

HTML

									
										<section class="container" role="main">
	<h1>Payment Information</h1>

	<form id="payment-information-form" class="payment-information-form">
		<table class="table tablesaw tablesaw-stack" data-tablesaw-mode="stack">
			<thead>
				<tr>
					<th>Account Name</th>
					<th>Account Number</th>
					<th>Routing Number</th>
					<th>Default Account</th>
					<th>&nbsp;</th>
				</tr>
			</thead>

			<tbody>
				<tr>
					<td>Main purchasing account</td>
					<td>********1234</td>
					<td>********1234</td>
					<td>
						<div class="radio-group">
							<input type="radio" id="pi-account-1" name="pi-default-group" checked="checked" />
							<label for="pi-account-1"></label>
						</div>
					</td>
					<td>
						<a href="#" class="edit-link">Edit</a>
					</td>
				</tr>
				
				<tr>
					<td>Secondary purchasing account</td>
					<td>********1234</td>
					<td>********1234</td>
					<td>
						<div class="radio-group">
							<input type="radio" id="pi-account-2" name="pi-default-group" />
							<label for="pi-account-2"></label>
						</div>
					</td>
					<td>
						<a href="#" class="edit-link">Edit</a>
					</td>
				</tr>
			</tbody>
		</table>
	</form>

	<div class="bottom-actions">
		<div class="row">
			<div class="col-sm-4 col-md-3">
				<a href="#" class="btn">Add New Account</a>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</section>

Add Payment Information

Add Payment Information

Please enter your bank account information below.

This Enrollment Form may only be submitted by an authorized representative of your dealership (Aristocrat Motors). By submitting this Enrollment Form, you are certifying to RMS Automotive, LLC and any affiliate or service provider acting on its behalf (each, a “Payment Facilitator”) that you are an authorized representative of Dealer, and that the authorizations and agreements below are being made in your representative capacity for and on behalf of Dealer.

By clicking on the “Submit” button below, Dealer hereby:

1. Authorizes any Payment Facilitator to initiate electronic credit and debit entries to or from Dealer’s checking account designated below (“Electronic Transactions”) for the purpose of administering or facilitating any online vehicle transaction, include any purchase or sale transaction, or any unwind, refund or other reversal resulting from any vehicle arbitration (each, an “Online Vehicle Transaction”); and

2. Agrees to the Terms and Conditions for Electronic Transactions, which include additional terms and conditions applicable to Dealer and Electronic Transactions generally.

Dealer understands that it is expressly authorizing and directing the Payment Facilitator to initiate Electronic Transactions at any time for any amounts that Dealer may owe or be owed in connection with any Online Vehicle Transaction (including for any fees or expenses that Dealer may owe). The authorizations and agreements provided above and the Terms and Conditions for Electronic Transactions are legally binding. Please review them carefully prior to submission.

Cancel

										<section class="container" role="main">
	<h1>Add Payment Information</h1>

	<p>Please enter your bank account information below.</p>

	<form id="add-payment-information-form" class="add-payment-information-form validate-form">

			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="terms-block">
			<p>This Enrollment Form may only be submitted by an authorized representative of your dealership (Aristocrat Motors). By submitting this Enrollment Form, you are certifying to RMS Automotive, LLC and any affiliate or service provider acting on its behalf (each, a “Payment Facilitator”) that you are an authorized representative of Dealer, and that the authorizations and agreements below are being made in your representative capacity for and on behalf of Dealer.</p>

			<p>By clicking on the “Submit” button below, Dealer hereby:</p>

			<p>1.	Authorizes any Payment Facilitator to initiate electronic credit and debit entries to or from Dealer’s checking account designated below (“Electronic Transactions”) for the purpose of administering or facilitating any online vehicle transaction, include any purchase or sale transaction, or any unwind, refund or other reversal resulting from any vehicle arbitration (each, an “Online Vehicle Transaction”); and</p>

			<p>2.	Agrees to the Terms and Conditions for Electronic Transactions, which include additional terms and conditions applicable to Dealer and Electronic Transactions generally.</p>

			<p>Dealer understands that it is expressly authorizing and directing the Payment Facilitator to initiate Electronic Transactions at any time for any amounts that Dealer may owe or be owed in connection with any Online Vehicle Transaction (including for any fees or expenses that Dealer may owe). The authorizations and agreements provided above and the Terms and Conditions for Electronic Transactions are legally binding. Please review them carefully prior to submission.</p>
		</div>
		<div class="bottom-actions">
			<div class="row">

Terms and Conditions

Phasellus accumsan eros id rutrum rutrum. Etiam rutrum felis nisl, id volutpat ipsum sodales quis. Pellentesque nec pharetra libero. Cras venenatis dolor eget sapien dapibus, id blandit justo aliquet. Morbi porta dui id erat pellentesque tincidunt sed vitae leo. Suspendisse ultrices interdum maximus. Aliquam ut massa dapibus nunc scelerisque tincidunt. Suspendisse accumsan felis ac augue fringilla facilisis. Praesent dictum nunc ipsum, eu cursus sem bibendum a.

Donec felis nisi, venenatis vel viverra dapibus, iaculis eget erat. In hac habitasse platea dictumst. Mauris ornare ligula quam, nec fringilla metus hendrerit sed. Vestibulum id dui orci. Nullam diam sem, ultrices sit amet convallis et, consequat a orci. Quisque molestie mauris in velit tempus, a ornare magna aliquam. Fusce ornare nunc vel sem consequat, id elementum ipsum fringilla. 					<li><a href="#">Reward Program</a></li>

					<li><a href="#" class="">Purchase History-xx</a></li>
					<li><a href="#" class="">Bid History</a></li>
				</ul>
			</nav>			
		</div>
	</div>


</header>

	<!-- activity row -->


	<div class="row my-activity">

		<!-- activity section -->
		<div class="col-sm-6">
			<h3>
				Sales Channel Activity (4)
				<a href="#" class="heading-link">View All</a>
			</h3>

			<div class="activity-container">
				
				
			Hello world.

			<style>
			/* 
			  make each pie piece a rectangle twice as high as it is wide.
			  move the transform origin to the middle of the left side.
			  Also ensure that overflow is set to hidden.
			*/
			  .pie {
					position:absolute;
					width:100px;
					height:200px;
					overflow:hidden;
					left:150px;
					-moz-transform-origin:left center;
					-ms-transform-origin:left center;
					-o-transform-origin:left center;
					-webkit-transform-origin:left center;
					transform-origin:left center;
				}
			/*
			  unless the piece represents more than 50% of the whole chart.
			  then make it a square, and ensure the transform origin is
			  back in the center.

			  NOTE: since this is only ever a single piece, you could
			  move this to a piece specific rule and remove the extra class
			*/
				.pie.big {
					width:200px;
					height:200px;
					left:50px;
					-moz-transform-origin:center center;
					-ms-transform-origin:center center;
					-o-transform-origin:center center;
					-webkit-transform-origin:center center;
					transform-origin:center center;
				}
			/*
			  this is the actual visible part of the pie. 
			  Give it the same dimensions as the regular piece.
			  Use border radius make it a half circle.
			  move transform origin to the middle of the right side.
			  Push it out to the left of the containing box.
			*/
				.pie:BEFORE {
					content:"";
					position:absolute;
					width:100px;
					height:200px;
					left:-100px;
					border-radius:100px 0 0 100px;
					-moz-transform-origin:right center;
					-ms-transform-origin:right center;
					-o-transform-origin:right center;
					-webkit-transform-origin:right center;
					transform-origin:right center;
					
				}
			 /* if it's part of a big piece, bring it back into the square */
				.pie.big:BEFORE {
					left:0px;
				}
			/* 
			  big pieces will also need a second semicircle, pointed in the
			  opposite direction to hide the first part behind.
			*/
				.pie.big:AFTER {
					content:"";
					position:absolute;
					width:100px;
					height:200px;
					left:100px;
					border-radius:0 100px 100px 0;
				}
			/*
			  add colour to each piece.
			*/
				.pie:nth-of-type(1):BEFORE,
				.pie:nth-of-type(1):AFTER {
					background-color:blue;	
				}
				.pie:nth-of-type(2):AFTER,
				.pie:nth-of-type(2):BEFORE {
					background-color:green;	
				}
				.pie:nth-of-type(3):AFTER,
				.pie:nth-of-type(3):BEFORE {
					background-color:red;	
				}
				.pie:nth-of-type(4):AFTER,
				.pie:nth-of-type(4):BEFORE {
					background-color:orange;	
				}
			/*
			  now rotate each piece based on their cumulative starting
			  position
			*/
				.pie[data-start="30"] {
					-moz-transform: rotate(30deg); /* Firefox */
					-ms-transform: rotate(30deg); /* IE */
					-webkit-transform: rotate(30deg); /* Safari and Chrome */
					-o-transform: rotate(30deg); /* Opera */
					transform:rotate(30deg);
				}
				.pie[data-start="60"] {
					-moz-transform: rotate(60deg); /* Firefox */
					-ms-transform: rotate(60deg); /* IE */
					-webkit-transform: rotate(60deg); /* Safari and Chrome */
					-o-transform: rotate(60deg); /* Opera */
					transform:rotate(60deg);
				}
				.pie[data-start="100"] {
					-moz-transform: rotate(100deg); /* Firefox */
					-ms-transform: rotate(100deg); /* IE */
					-webkit-transform: rotate(100deg); /* Safari and Chrome */
					-o-transform: rotate(100deg); /* Opera */
					transform:rotate(100deg);
				}
			/*
			  and rotate the amount of the pie that's showing.

			  NOTE: add an extra degree to all but the final piece, 
			  to fill in unsightly gaps.
			*/
				.pie[data-value="30"]:BEFORE {
					-moz-transform: rotate(31deg); /* Firefox */
					-ms-transform: rotate(31deg); /* IE */
					-webkit-transform: rotate(31deg); /* Safari and Chrome */
					-o-transform: rotate(31deg); /* Opera */
					transform:rotate(31deg);
				}
				.pie[data-value="40"]:BEFORE {
					-moz-transform: rotate(41deg); /* Firefox */
					-ms-transform: rotate(41deg); /* IE */
					-webkit-transform: rotate(41deg); /* Safari and Chrome */
					-o-transform: rotate(41deg); /* Opera */
					transform:rotate(41deg);
				}
				.pie[data-value="260"]:BEFORE {
					-moz-transform: rotate(260deg); /* Firefox */
					-ms-transform: rotate(260deg); /* IE */
					-webkit-transform: rotate(260deg); /* Safari and Chrome */
					-o-transform: rotate(260deg); /* Opera */
					transform:rotate(260deg);
				}
			/*
			NOTE: you could also apply custom classes (i.e. .s0 .v30)
			but if the CSS3 attr() function proposal ever gets implemented,
			then all the above custom piece rules could be replaced with
			the following:

			.pie[data-start] {
			   transform:rotate(attr(data-start,deg,0);
			}
			.pie[data-value]:BEFORE {
			   transform:rotate(attr(data-value,deg,0);
			}
			*/

			</style>

			<!-- 
			for each piece of the pie chart create one div and give it
			a data-value attribute that represents the amount (in degrees) that
			represents its total visible portion, and a data-start attribute
			that matches the amount rotation for the starting  (the cumulative value amount of all the previous pieces).

			 
			-->
			<div class="pie" data-start="0" data-value="30"></div>
			<div class="pie highlight" data-start="30" data-value="30"></div>
			<div class="pie" data-start="60" data-value="40"></div>
			<div class="pie big" data-start="100" data-value="260"></div>
				
			</div>

		</div>
		<!-- /activity section -->
		
		<!-- activity section -->

		<div class="col-sm-6">
			<h3>
				Vehicles For Sale (2)
				<a href="#" class="heading-link">View All</a>
			</h3>

			<div class="listing">
				<div class="row">
					<div class="vehicle-thumb col-sm-3">
						<img src="/img/vehicle-thumb.jpg" alt="Vehicle Thumb" />
					</div>

					<div class="listing-content col-sm-5">
						<a href="#" class="vehicle-name">2013 BMW 5 Series lx</a>
						<span class="vehicle-desc">blue</span>
						<span class="vehicle-desc">68,542 miles</span>
					</div>

					<div class="listing-meta col-sm-4">
						<span class="vehicle-cost">$57,875</span>
						<span class="buy-it-now-price"><strong>Buy It Now Price:</strong> $75,000</span>
						<span class="bid-count"><strong>9</strong> bids</span>
						<span class="time-left">57m, 37s left</span>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>

			<div class="listing">
				<div class="row">
					<div class="vehicle-thumb col-sm-3">
						<img src="/img/vehicle-thumb.jpg" alt="Vehicle Thumb" />
					</div>

					<div class="listing-content col-sm-5">
						<a href="#" class="vehicle-name">2013 BMW 5 Series lx</a>
						<span class="vehicle-desc">blue</span>
						<span class="vehicle-desc">68,542 miles</span>
					</div>

					<div class="listing-meta col-sm-4">
						<span class="vehicle-cost">$57,875</span>
						<span class="bid-count"><strong>9</strong> bids</span>
						<span class="time-left">57m, 37s left</span>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>

	<div class="container">
		<div class="row">
			<div class="col-sm-9 main-footer-nav">
				<nav id="nav-footer" class="nav footer-nav xs-hidden print-hidden">
					<ul class="nav-list">
						<li><a href="#">Dashboard</a></li>
						
						<li>
							<a href="#">Buy a Vehicle</a>

							<ul class="subnav">
								<li><a href="#">Advanced Search</a></li>
								<li><a href="#">My Saved Searches</a></li>
								<li><a href="#">My Watch List</a></li>
								<li><a href="#">My Current Bids</a></li>
							</ul>
						</li>
						
						<li>
							<a href="#">Grounding</a>

							<ul class="subnav">
								<li><a href="#">Ground a Vehicle</a></li>
								<li><hr /></li>
								<li><a href="#">Incoming Lease Vehicles</a></li>
								<li><a href="#">My Grounded Vehicles</a></li>
								<li><a href="#">Grounding History</a></li>
							</ul>
						</li>
						
						<li>
							<a href="#">My Account</a>

							<ul class="subnav">
								<li><a href="#">My Profile</a></li>
								<li><a href="#">Account Settings</a></li>
								<li><a href="#">Payment Information</a></li>
								<li><a href="#">Reward Program</a></li>
								<li><hr /></li>
								<li><a href="#">Purchase History</a></li>
								<li><a href="#">Bid History</a></li>
							</ul>

						</li>
					</ul>
				</nav>
			</div>

			<div class="col-sm-3 sub-footer-nav">
				<nav id="sub-nav-footer" class="nav footer-nav footer-sub-nav print-hidden">
					<ul class="nav-list">
						<li class="xs-hidden">
							<ul class="subnav">
								<li><a href="#terms-modal" data-toggle="modal">Terms and Conditions</a></li>
								<li><a href="#">Contact Us</a></li>
								<li><hr /></li>
							</ul>

							<a href="#">Logout</a>
						</li>

						<li class="xs-inline-block">
							<a href="#terms-modal" data-toggle="modal">Terms and Conditions</a>
						</li>

						<li class="xs-inline-block large">
							<a href="#">Logout</a>
						</li>

						<li class="xs-inline-block large">
							<a href="#">Contact Us</a>
						</li>
					</ul>
				</nav>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</footer>

<div class="modal fade print-hidden" id="terms-modal" data-xs-sheet="terms-sheet">
	<div class="modal-dialog">
		<div class="modal-content">
			<div class="modal-header">
				<button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close"><span aria-hidden="true">X</span></button>
			</div>
			
			<div class="modal-body terms-modal">
				<a href="#" class="close xs-visible" data-sheet-toggle="terms-sheet">X</a>
				<h2>Terms and Conditions</h2>

				<p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Vestibulum elit velit, lobortis id accumsan lacinia, condimentum tempus nunc. Duis iaculis nibh nec libero porttitor, ut lacinia metus laoreet. Praesent tempor laoreet ante, vitae eleifend sem hendrerit ac. Aenean eros sapien, molestie vel ante quis, lacinia venenatis leo. Phasellus accumsan eros id rutrum rutrum. Etiam rutrum felis nisl, id volutpat ipsum sodales quis. Pellentesque nec pharetra libero. Cras venenatis dolor eget sapien dapibus, id blandit justo aliquet. Morbi porta dui id erat pellentesque tincidunt sed vitae leo. Suspendisse ultrices interdum maximus. Aliquam ut massa dapibus nunc scelerisque tincidunt. Suspendisse accumsan felis ac augue fringilla facilisis. Praesent dictum nunc ipsum, eu cursus sem bibendum a.</p>

				<p>Mauris et sollicitudin nulla, et consectetur mauris. Sed et viverra quam. Curabitur dapibus non eros quis porta. Curabitur felis augue, ullamcorper at lacus et, dictum cursus metus. Donec felis nisi, venenatis vel viverra dapibus, iaculis eget erat. In hac habitasse platea dictumst. Mauris ornare ligula quam, nec fringilla metus hendrerit sed. Vestibulum id dui orci. Nullam diam sem, ultrices sit amet convallis et, consequat a orci. Quisque molestie mauris in velit tempus, a ornare magna aliquam. Fusce ornare nunc vel sem consequat, id elementum ipsum fringilla. Pellentesque tempor turpis ac sagittis congue.</p>
			</div>
		</div><!-- /.modal-content -->
	</div><!-- /.modal-dialog -->
</div><!-- /.modal -->
